mapper.select: select level, board_id boardId, board_parentno boardParentno, board_title boardTitle, board_desc boardDesc, board_time boardTime, u.user_id userId from board_info b, user_info u where b.user_id = u.user_id start with board_parentno = 0 connect by prior board_id = board_parentno order siblings by board_id desc
insert into board_info (board_id, user_id, board_parentno, board_title, board_desc, board_time) values(board_info_seq.nextval, #{boardId}, #{userId}, #{boardParentno}, #{boardTitle}, sysdate)
